name: Brent & Cassie: Zombie Invasion
description: This is a small game I made for my friends Brent and Cassie who just recently got married. This is a wedding gift to them for them to play together. The keyboard (WASD and spacebar) is one person, and the mouse (left and right) is another. It can be played with one person only as well but it is more challenging. See rules screen on main menu for more details.
